name: MARVELS
information: Upon opening 'Marvel Avengers Match, the user has a view of two dropdown menus which allow them to choose a hero & rival; once the user selects MATCH, they are able to view character information for both selection options. This information includes a picture, name, location, etc, which is pulled from our first API. The user also has another option, RANK, which allows the user to view which Avenger would win in a battle based on character stats pulled from our second API.
